channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Diamondback’s Viper Energy buys Sitio Royalties for $4.1 billion in merger of the top two minerals players
item.description: The minerals and royalties deal continues Diamondback's ascent as the top producer focused on the still-booming Permian Basin.

item.title: Monro closing stores: Muffler, brake, and auto repair chain joins list of retailers shuttering locations in 2025
item.description: One of the most popular auto repair and tire shops in America said it will shutter 145 locations across the country by the end of the month. Monro Inc...

item.title: Disney announces hundreds of global layoffs. Here are the teams that will be affected
item.description: Media company Walt Disney is laying off several hundred employees in film, television and corporate finance, a source familiar with the matter said on...

item.title: Fewer people are quitting their jobs right now—but layoffs are on the rise
item.description: Uncertainty in the economy means more people are trying to stay in their jobs, so long as employers choose to keep them around.

item.title: Pyx Health Acquires FarmboxRx as Nutrition Startups Heat Up in MAHA America
item.description: The two female-founded businesses address non-medical barriers to better health. The combined firm could see a boost under RFK Jr.’s HHS.

item.title: FEMA staff baffled: agency chief didn’t know ‘what or when hurricane season is’
item.description: Staff of the Federal Emergency Management Agency were left baffled on Monday after the head of the U.S. disaster agency said he had not been aware the...

item.title: What 18 Years in Toastmasters Taught Me About Leadership That No MBA Could
item.description: Toastmasters helps people with public speaking, but this hidden benefit is even more important for today’s business leaders.

item.title: Snowflake CEO says environment for deals is good as VC-backed startups look for exits
item.description: As Snowflake announced the acquisition of Crunchy Data for a reported $250 million, CEO Sridhar Ramaswamy shared his thought on the current environmen...

item.title: The growth of the world’s largest economy will slow to 1.6% thanks to Trump’s tariffs
item.description: U.S. economic growth will slow to 1.6% this year from 2.8% last year as President Donald Trump’s erratic trade wars disrupt global commerce, drive up ...

item.title: Chipotle’s new CEO is bringing back a missing ingredient to hit the chain’s next goal—raising annual sales per store to $4 million
item.description: You can now expect a warmer greeting from your Chipotle burrito slinger.

item.title: A Leader’s Age is More Than a Number. Treat It Strategically in Family Business
item.description: In family enterprises, a proactive approach to age and retirement is critical.

item.title: ‘Shark Tank’ Star Daniel Lubetzky Delivered a UC Berkeley Commencement on the Four Superpowers of Youth
item.description: Youth is a mindset. When deployed in business, watch as it transforms the world around you.

item.title: Billionaire YouTuber MrBeast says he actually has ‘very little money’ and is borrowing cash from his mom to pay for his wedding
item.description: "A decade ago before I blew up everyone in my life told me I was to obsessed and constantly told I’d never make it," Jimmy Donaldson wrote on X.

item.title: This new AI tool at the Food and Drug Administration promises to speed up scientific reviews
